channel.title: Posts on Trevor Jordan's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Trevor Jordan's Blog

item.title: US K-12 Public Education
item.description: What does the average person think about the United States education system? In general, I think most Americans would believe that they are very competitive when it comes to education. Of the top 10 best universities in the world, 8 can be found in the United States. These statistics, however, unjustly display the underlying issue plaguing the US education system that over time is making Americans less competitive in a growing global economy.
